titleStmt.title: Learning's foundation firmly laid, in a short method of teaching to read English, more exact and easie then ever was yet published by any comprehending all things necessary for the perfect and speedy attaining of the same. Whereby any one of discretion may be brought to read the Bible truly in the space of a month, though he never knew letter before. The truth whereof hath been confirmed by manifold experience. / By George Robertson, schoolmaster between the two North-Doors of Paul's, in the new buildings.
titleStmt.author: Robertson, George, schoolmaster.
